SummaryEnglish: In order to save her brother and nephew who have been kidnapped by a mysterious religious group known as the Genuine Love Society, Juri and her family cast a spell using a stone hidden by her grandfather to enter the world of stopped time known as Stasis. However, when they infiltrate the kidnapper's base, they're met by other people who can also move about freely. With grotesque creatures lurking about, will they be able to escape the parallel world and return to their normal lives?!

1.SummaryEnglish: Juri returns home from yet another failed job interview and vents her stress on her good for nothing father and shut in brother. When it's time to go pick up her nephew Makoto, she forces his uncle to go. However, it is at this moment that the ordinary life of the Yukawa family will change dramatically, as Juri receives a phone call demanding ransom!

2.SummaryEnglish: Juri and her grandfather are unable to rescue Makoto and Tsubasa because of the appearance of a group of mysterious men.

3.SummaryEnglish: Juri heads to her house in search of the stone, but is attacked by a member of the Genuine Love Society.

4.SummaryEnglish: Juri and her grandfather are pursued by more men from the Genuine Love Society, but when running away is no longer an option she decides to fight back.

5.SummaryEnglish: Majima tells the story of how she first entered the world of Stasis, when Juri and her grandfather suddenly return home.

6.SummaryEnglish: Takafumi, angered by his ignorance of the Stasis, lashes out at his father and daughter who came to rescue him. Majima moves to act out her plan independently from the Genuine Love Society.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Heralds disperse, and in the middle of the scene stands an emaciated boy. Meanwhile, Sagawa reveals the results of his research on the Great Circle Scriptures.

8.SummaryEnglish: Sagawa puts his theories to the test by using his remaining henchmen. Juri plans to save her brother from his grasp.

9.SummaryEnglish: Discussion on the nature of the Stasis and Sagawa's goal force Juri and her grandfather into a race against time itself.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Yukawa family confronts Sagawa directly by using the various Stasis powers they possess.

11.SummaryEnglish: Sagawa is cornered and explains how he came to be the leader of the Genuine Love Society.

12.SummaryEnglish: Juri sends everyone but her grandfather back to the normal world, as he is opposed to leaving her alone in Stasis.
